TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Young Professional -II Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 17:29 IST
 Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Science University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 35,000 to 35,000




FOLLOW

The Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (TANUVAS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Young Professional -II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc., can apply for the TANUVAS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Young Professional- II	01	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc

TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 35,000/- per month.
How to apply for the TANUVAS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

The Principal Investigator (NLM), Institute of Animal Nutrition, PGRIAS campus, Kattupakkam, Kattankolathur Post, Chengalpattu-603203.

E-mail Address:

nlmiantanuvas@gmail.com.

Important Dates:

Starting date	08-08-2025
Closing date	20-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
